page.title: 10SCHOOL REPORTS.
page.content:
Our parents like to know how we do at shool. They are given small booklets called reports. Each teacher will fill in a paper like this:
{Name: Lisa Hall. Subject: R.S. {Exam mark: 60% Term mark: 55% {Achievement: B- Effort: 1
{Lisa works well in class. The {examination result was pleasing.
Achievement is graded A to E. A is very good. B is good. C is fair and D is weak. Effort is graded 1 to 4. 1 is very good, 2 is good, 3 is fair and 4 is slight. I am studying 8 subjects so I will receive eight papers in my booklet.
